text: The Information Technology Act, 2000 addresses legal issues concerning electronic commerce, cybercrime, digital signatures, and protection of electronic data in India.
description: This law governs cyber activities in India, covering e-commerce, digital contracts, and online data protection.

text: Section 129 of the Motor Vehicles Act mandates that every person driving or riding on a motorcycle must wear a protective headgear conforming to prescribed standards.
description: Ensures rider safety by making helmets compulsory, with specific quality standards for protection.

text: The Right to Information Act, 2005 empowers citizens to request information from public authorities, promoting transparency and accountability in governance.
description: Gives citizens the right to access government records, fostering transparency in public administration.

text: The Indian Penal Code, Section 420 deals with cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property.
description: Punishes fraud and dishonest inducement with imprisonment and/or fine.

text: The Consumer Protection Act, 2019 protects the interests of consumers and establishes authorities for timely and effective settlement of consumer disputes.
description: Provides mechanisms for grievance redressal, product liability, and consumer rights awareness.
